lines.text: Look, do you mind if I lay my towel here? I ain't welcome over there.
Why not?
Why ain't I welcome or it's ok to lay here?
Take your pick.
Forget it, Murphy. Roadblocks won't stop somethin' that can't be stopped.
Loomis, what're you sayin'?
I'm sayin' it's over. There's nobody left in Packard's gang to kill.
[after drinking a bottle of brake fluid]
Aaagh! I'm tweakin', dude!

You listen to me, you son-of-a-bitch! There's a kid out there usin' his car to kill people, not that it's such a big deal since it seems to be your gang he's got it in for... so, if you guys try to take the law into your own hands, and that killer turns up dead, I'm gonna see you all sniffin' cyanide in the Arizona gas chamber.

[after kissing Jake]
Nice.
I thought so, too.
Look, Jake, if Packard knew I was here with you... I mean, people are afriad of him for a reason.
People are afraid because guys like Packard prey on fear and weakness.
Well, I just think he's crazy. Try and be brave against Packard and he might kill you.
Or he might let you go. Courage isn't easy to come by. That's how he keeps those goons with him all the time. They're just scared.
So am I.
Keri, listen. There's gonna come a time when you'll have to take a stand. When you do that, that's when you'll free yourself of him. No sooner.
Okay! The first one to Dragonfire Crossing wins! You lose the race, you lose your car! Ready! Set! GO!
This gang thing was okay when we had the edge, but now that there's that wraith out there that killed Oggie...
A what out there, man?
A wraith, man! A ghost! A evil spirit - and it ain't cool!
Skank!
Yeah?
Who is that guy?
I don't know, but whoever he was, he's weird and pissed off!

[Talking about Keri]
Me and her are pretty good friends. Well, actually she's... she used to be tight with my brother. She's got real problems with that lunatic she's with there now.
What kind of problems?
Well, Packard's a mistake of nature or a genetic misfire.

[laughing]
He's what?
Packard gets crazy jealous if anybody even looks at Keri cross-eyed. You gotta wear dark glasses so he doesn't catch you at it.
[the gang is looking for The Wraith after he trashes their chop shop]
So where is he, tuna can?
Dude, we couldn't find the slimeball anywhere!
Yeah, we went 'cross town, down to Crawford's Gully. We stopped for a... a box of Goobers...
You guys are pissin' me off! I want that faggot!
Yeah! This freak's into us for about 13,000 bucks!
We spent all last night banging on the two bodies! I got scabs on my knuckles and everything like that!
It's your damn job, Gutterboy.

[referring to the Wraith]
What's he got with us?
What he's got is an ass full of trouble.
Yeah, it's about time we got into somebody's ass, huh, guys?
Yeah, we'll beat him like a red-headed step-child!
I'm gonna knock his ass lower than whale shit.

[after The Wraith has transformed into Jake]
Jake!

[smiles]
You know who I am.

[pause, then she realizes the truth]
Jamie!
[She runs into his arms and they embrace]
This is as close as I could come to who I once was.
It's close enough.
[They kiss]
[Having handed Billy the keys to his car, Jake quickly disappears down the street on his bike]
Wait a minute! Come back! Come back, bro!

[turns to look at the Turbo Interceptor he's just been given]
Whoa. Ha-ha. Whoa! Cool. Hey, man, far out.

[calling out to the empty street]
Hey, Jake, who are you?

[slowly realizing who Jake is]
It couldn't have been... Jake! Jake! JAMIE!

[after he has transformed from The Wraith back into himself]
Can't do *that* again!
This kid smashed down a canyon through fire and bustin' glass.
Must've been a thousand degrees in that car.
Uh-huh. At least.
Where's his eyes?
Sent cats climbin' up my spine when I saw 'em haulin' this corpse outta that canyon - clean as if he'd come out of a hot tub. I'm worried, Loomis. Som'pin' ain't right.
Things are getting a little too equal these days.

[to the crowd who stood around watching Packard abduct Keri and beat and kick Billy to the ground]
You bastard chickenshits! You let him take her!
And, uh, Skank, do me a favor, will ya? Get rid of that zombie-piss you're drinkin' before it turns you into a mushroom!
You think I'd go to California with you? I'd rather go to Nogales, have the Gutterboy's cretin children and die than to be with you.
You better shut up now, Keri, or I'm gonna have to...
Yeah, you can kill me, too, Packard, but you can never make me love you.

[catching Billy about to take Keri home]
So what happened here? Looks to me like you ran out of those all-beef patties kind of EARLY today, huh?
Hey, don't worry, Pack. We still got plenty of dog food.
Hey, Packard, let's grind up some meat, huh?
Hey, has this guy been wormed or is he just a naturally gifted child?
[Oggie makes a lunge for Billy but Packard detains him with a knife to his throat]

[to Billy]
I swear to God I'll... I'll rip your head off and piss down your throat.
Hold your water Oggie. This is business.
Bad feelin's don't add up to resurrections, buddy.
You're nothing but road pirates! You gotta cheat to win!

[as Packard opens his switchblade]
Let's go, George.
Escape, pal, while you still got your lips attached to your face!
Well, it's time for me to hit the road. My business here is finished. Before I do, I want you to have somethin'.
[hands Billy his car keys]
She's yours now.
Who's mine?
It's outside. Turbo Interceptor. The only one in existence. Does very special things. Take care of it, will ya?
Who are you, bro?
You said it, Billy.
Who are you?
Ask Packard.
Packard?
He knows why I'm here.

[to Keri]
Think of it as a second chance... we were meant to be together.

[to The Wraith]
You want a race? 'Cause I'll show you a race!

[Looking down at an intensely flaming car wreck]
You think he made it?
You gotta be kiddin' me. Local kid?
Used to be.
I don't need a warrant when I have this badge.
But we know our constipational rights, sir, and you can't just come in here and...
I dreamed that the man in the moon was laughing at me.
He does laugh all the time. You ever notice that?
Then I was headed east on the back of a motorcycle and the driver was Jamie Henkins. What's strange is that Jamie's dead.
OK pal; time to drain the drug overdose sloshin' above your eyebrows and tell me who the dude was drivin' that other car.
[Sheriff Loomis approaches]
Man, I smell a cop! Do you smell a cop?
Uh, I smell french fries, Skank, but that don't make no sense, huh?
Lot of duckbutter out at the lake today, eh, Pack? Heh-heh-heh-heh-heh.
Quiff City, here I come!
We'll remind the cockstacker.

[Oggie is about to race the Wraith]
All right. I want you to tear this guy a new asshole. Do it to him 'Oggie-style'.
I'll burn this Iranian!
Why'd you stop me? What do you want?
Well, let's just say it's pink.
Oh, god!
Forget it pal, no way!
I might forget it. I'm a nice guy.

[nods to his gang members]
But them? They think the title to your car might be worth something.
I've been waitin' to catch you guys in the act. Been waitin' and watchin'.
Congratulations. You caught us talking. There's no law against that, is there officer? Unless of course I got my wires crossed and you caught us speaking without a permit.
Clam it, wiseguy!
[repeated line]
Jesus, this shit's got some kick!
Eat hot lead, crud sucker!
This one's for Oggie, huh, sucker?
Look, Pack, you don't get my car. And if you're not nice you're not gonna get your burgers with the mayo and thousand island the way you love 'em.

Well, you listen good, Skank. I know it's gonna be hard with your melon on chemical overload, but there's a killer out there and I'm gonna track the hairball down. So, when you two crater-heads get finished mining for nose gold and you get a relapse of memory, you let me know, huh? I'm just a phone call away.
